sentences: Maria Chefaliady-Taban (4 November 1863 â€“ 11 June 1932) was a Romanian pianist, music educator and composer.
She continued her studies from 1883-85 in Vienna with Joseph Dachs and Joseph Hellmesberger  at the Akademie fur Musik und Darstellende Kunst.
After completing her studies, Chefaliady-Taban performed as a concert pianist and later became a singing teacher in Iasi and Bucharest.
